definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly

sentences.english: The discrepancy means poor countries will end up bearing most of the burden themselves.
sentences.chinese: 這種言行不一意味着最終窮國將自己擔起大部分重擔。

sentences.english: Do poor countries have a self-interested economic case to help the rich?
sentences.chinese: 窮國幫助富國是否有自己的經濟利益？

sentences.english: Ultimately, this reflects the resentments of a poor neighbor against a richer one.
sentences.chinese: 從根本上講，這反映出窮國對於鄰近富國的憎恨。

sentences.english: Then how can you say China is also a poor country?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能說中國也是個窮國？

sentences.english: This is a hefty deterrent to doing business in poor countries, some studies have found.
sentences.chinese: 有研究發現，這成了企業進駐窮國的極大障礙。

sentences.english: US per-capita energy consumption is 250 times greater than in many poor countries.
sentences.chinese: 美國的人均能源消耗量是很多窮國的250倍。

sentences.english: Life expectancies between rich and poor countries can differ by as much as 40 years.
sentences.chinese: 富國與窮國之間期望壽命的差異可高達40年。

sentences.english: Five scholars are theorizing about the best system of education in this poor country.
sentences.chinese: 有五位學者正在論證這個窮國的最佳教育體制。

sentences.english: They say rich countries get richer, while poor countries struggle to repay.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，富國愈富，而窮國爲還貸不斷掙扎。

sentences.english: The issue of aid for the poorest countries to adapt to the impact of climate change has been shunted aside.
sentences.chinese: 幫助窮國適應氣候變化影響的議題被推到一旁。

sentences.english: Reneging on our commitments to the world's poor can not be an austerity measure.
sentences.chinese: 放棄我們給世界上窮國的承諾不能成爲一種緊縮措施。

sentences.english: Doomsters have other reasons to worry, especially about the poor.
sentences.chinese: 末日論者有另外一些理由特別擔心窮國。

sentences.english: Thus, even non-industrialized, poor economies are creating environmental disasters.
sentences.chinese: 可見，即使是非工業化的經濟窮國也在製造環境災害。
